name: ALONE in NEW First Class Suite on British Airways *First on YouTube*
description:
Reviewed for the first time on YouTube onboard the 787-10 Dreamliner - the full BA First Class experience is back! 

Come with me onboard BA's brand new 787-10 which was delivered to the airline just a few months ago. I'll be trying out their reinstated full service which unfortunately was removed for the last 12 months down to the pandemic. 

Follow my travels live on IG: will.luxurytravel

-------

Flying First Class on British Airways - Honest Review
British Airways Dreamliner B787-9 First Class London to Abu Dhabi (+ Concorde Room)
Reviewing Four Classes On The Same British Airways Flight | First, Business, Premium & Economy
BRITISH AIRWAYS FIRST CLASS Flight, Boeing 777-200 - Houston to London!
British Airways Boeing 787-9 First Class London to Muscat via Abu Dhabi
